item.title: Catalytic Impedance Spectroscopy: Concept and Application on CO<sub>2</sub> Methanation
item.description:
Andreas Borgschulte, Marco Achermann, Marin Nikolić, The Journal of Physical Chemistry Letters. None(None)] 2024. https://openalex.org/W4403336465
Complex modeling of periodic excitation combined with time-resolved product detection is used to describe the complex response function of a catalytic system. We describe this concept of catalytic impedance spectroscopy (CIS) and the underlying general experimental approach and a concrete setup. The feasibility of CIS is experimentally demonstrated along the catalytic CO
item.author: Andreas Borgschulte, Marco Achermann, Marin Nikolić

item.title: Exsolved Cu–ZnO interfaces for methanol production from CO<sub>2</sub> at atmospheric pressure
item.description:
Sanaz Soodi, Eleonora Calì, Shailza Saini, William S. J. Skinner, Alex Martinez Martin, Gwilherm Kerherve, Marco Pietro Mezzapesa, Samir Bensaid, David J. Payne, Melis S. Duyar, Kalliopi Kousi, Journal of Materials Chemistry A. None(None)] 2024. https://openalex.org/W4403491297
An exsolved intimate Cu–ZnO interface allows for the conversion of CO 2 to methanol at atmospheric pressures.
item.author: Sanaz Soodi, Eleonora Calì, Shailza Saini, William S. J. Skinner, Alex Martinez Martin, Gwilherm Kerherve, Marco Pietro Mezzapesa, Samir Bensaid, David J. Payne, Melis S. Duyar, Kalliopi Kousi
